text: No school official, teacher, or member of the Board of Education shall receive any pecuniary benefit on account of school supplies or textbooks purchased for the use of the public schools in the District of Columbia.
historical:

heading.catch_text: School officials not to profit on supplies or textbooks purchased for schools.
